system.description:
At 10th Level when using @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.hz933bxxwb8fawiu], you can predict the weather for the next week.

You can also use 3 rare herbs and a minute of work to create a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.3gmfg4fsi8abv1ej]{Superior Healing Potion}, and any healing potion you craft heals additional hit points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier. Basic, advanced, or potent poisons you craft deal additional damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier, and their DC is increased to your spell save DC.
